text:
Giuliana De Sio (born 2 April 1956) is an Italian actress. She is the younger sister of pop-folk singer Teresa De Sio. She was born in Salerno, Italy.
In the early 1980s she met with Massimo Troisi, who cast her in a major role in his second movie, "Scusate il ritardo" (1982). She later worked with Francesco Nuti in "Io, Chiara e lo Scuro" (1982) and "Casablanca Casablanca" (1985).
De Sio was diagnosed with COVID-19.
